title: So you're not disabling anyone in URF this time or what?
body:
I'd just like to know if the mode will be playable at some point before you remove it for another year.  

Please?

replies.body: Considering the fact that URF goes away in a week, I don't see why'd they bother banning any champs when it has such a short lifespan.

> [{quoted}](name=Azure KayZ,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=ubiMAH6H,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-06T22:52:17.851+0000)
>
> Considering the fact that URF goes away in a week, I don't see why'd they bother banning any champs when it has such a short lifespan.

Because they did last year and it was much better off that way

> [{quoted}](name=Elias1724,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=ubiMAH6H,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-04-06T23:01:42.193+0000)
>
> I know certain champs can feel like they are just so annoying and toxic to deal with in Urf, but it's the time that you take to develop and discover new ways to counter those that make it fun. I grin everytime I kill a Leblanc or Zed with my full AP Lichbane Warwick.

lol'd i get the feeling of shitting on 3 supports as fizz cuz fizz wounds DESTORYs the healing. fyi I play fizz because im sick of {{champion:81}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:3}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:126}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:143}} and in my games. There's at least 3 of them on EACH TEAM EVERY GAME.
I don't understand how people can play bad in URF to begin with, people just spam. Dodge most of it and counter them everytime they press it, itts down for atleast 2 seconds for the most part @ lv 1-3. Early level leads=gg
